availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Milton Barnett (Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah J. Renfro Barnett in Whitley County on September 8, 1860. Father of Mary J. Barnett, Francis M. Barnett, and Elizabeth D. Barnett. Farmer in Whitley County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Spring Rock, p. 713.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Whitley, p. 334B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Whitley County Marriages, Film #007578488, p. 145.
"James Barnett (1832-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #7569239, accessed June 20, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/7569239/james-barnett.
